00050 #include <w_pthread.h>
00051 
00052 /**\cond skip */
00053 typedef struct sthread_core_t {
00054     int          is_virgin;        /* TRUE if just started */
00055     void        (*start_proc)(void *);  /* thread start function */
00056     void        *start_arg;        /* argument for start_proc */
00057     int         stack_size;        /* stack size */
00058     void        *sthread;        /* sthread which uses this core */
00059     pthread_t   pthread;
00060     pthread_t   creator;         /* thread that created this pthread, for
00061                                     debugging only */
00062 } sthread_core_t;
00063 /**\endcond skip */
00064 
00065 ostream &operator<<(ostream &o, const sthread_core_t &core);
00066 
00067 extern int  sthread_core_init(sthread_core_t* t,
00068                               void (*proc)(void *), void *arg,
00069                               unsigned stack_size);
00070 
00071 extern void sthread_core_exit(sthread_core_t *t, bool &joined);
00072
